items.q: Is the store front area clean and maintained?
Is the signage clean and are all lights functioning?
Are the glass and doors smudge-free?
Do promotional displays reflect current offers?
Are POS tent cards as per the latest communication?
Are menu boards/DMB as per the latest communication?
Does the café have a welcoming environment (music, lighting, AC, aroma)?
Are washrooms cleaned and the checklist updated?
Is the FDU counter neat, fully stocked, and set as per the planogram?
Does the merch rack follow VM guidelines and attract attention?
Is staff grooming (uniform, jewellery, hair and makeup) as per standards?
Are all seating, furniture, and stations tidy and organized?
Is the engine area clean and ready for operations?
Is suggestive selling happening at the POS?
Is the POS partner updated on the latest promos and item availability?
Has order-taking time been recorded for 5 customers?
Is there sufficient cash and change at the POS?
Are valid licenses displayed and expiries checked (medical reports)?
Are cash audits completed and verified with the logbook?
Are daily banking reports tallied?
Has CPI been reviewed through the FAME pilot?
Are Swiggy/Zomato metrics (RDC, MFR, visibility) reviewed, and are Food Lock on LS and stock control on UrbanPiper managed per stock availability/opening inventory?
Are all food and drinks served as per SOP?
Are food orders placed based on the 4-week sales trend?
Is equipment cleaned and maintained?
Are temperature checks done with the Therma Pen and logs updated?
Is documentation (GRN, RSTN, STN & TO) completed?
Is fast-moving SKU availability checked and validated with LS?
Is the thawing chart validated against actual thawing?
Are deployment roles clear, with coaching and appreciation done by the MOD?
Are there no broken/unused tools stored in the store?
Is garbage segregated properly (wet/dry)?
Are LTO products served as per standards?
Is the coffee and food dial-in process followed?
Are R.O.A.S.T. and app orders executed accurately?
Have 5 order service times been validated?
Have open maintenance-related points been reviewed?
Has COGS been reviewed, with actions in place per last month P&L feedback?
Have BSC targets vs achievements been reviewed?
Has people budget vs actuals (labour cost/bench planning) been reviewed?
Has variance in stock (physical vs system) been verified?
Have the top 10 wastage items been reviewed?
Have store utilities (units, chemical use) been reviewed?
Have shift targets, briefings, and goal tracking been conducted?
Have new staff training and bench plans been reviewed?
Have Training and QA audits been reviewed?
Has the duty roster (off/coff, ELCL, tenure) been checked and attendance ensured as per ZingHR?
Have temperature and thawing logs been validated?
Have audit and data findings been cross-checked with store observations?
Is the pest control layout updated?
Have 2 new and 2 repeat customers been engaged, with feedback documented?
Are seating and stations adjusted as per customer requirements?
Is the team proactively assisting customers?
Is CCTV checked to monitor customer service during peak hours?
Is CCTV backup (minimum 60 days) in place and are black spots checked?
Is opening/closing footage reviewed for correct practices?
Are there no personal items/clutter in guest areas, with belongings kept in lockers/designated places?
Are there no unresolved issues at exits?
Is the final interaction cheerful and courteous?
Has a consolidated action plan been created with the Store Manager?
Have top performers been recognized?
Have wins been celebrated and improvement areas communicated?
Has the team been motivated for ongoing improvement?

Does the café have at least 20% of the staff certified Buddy Trainers?
Have Buddy Trainers completed their Skill Check?
Are trainees rostered with Buddy Trainers and working in the same shift?
Have Buddy Trainers attended the BT workshop?
Can Buddy Trainers explain the 4-step training process effectively?
Can Buddy Trainers navigate Zing LMS flawlessly?
Is the OJT book available for all partners?
Are trainees referring to the OJT book and completing their skill checks?
Is training progression aligned with the Training Calendar/Plan?
Are team members aware of post-barista training progressions?
Have managers completed SHLP training as per the calendar?
Are there at least 2 FOSTAC-certified managers in the store?
Is ASM/SM training completed as per the Training Calendar?
Are team members aware of current company communications?
Ask a team member to conduct a Coffee Tasting & Sampling
Is Sampling being conducted as per the set guidelines?
Is Coffee Tasting engaging and effective?
Are team members aware of manual brewing methods and standards?
Are partners following grooming standards?
Ask questions about key topics: COFFEE, LEAST, ROAST, Dial-in, Milk Steaming, LTO, Values(RESPECT), MSDS, Chemcial Dilution, Food Safety, and Security.
